channel.title: I NEED HELP on
channel.description:
i check the tutorials page and found nothing on it.
i need to know how to:
1. when you click "talk" on an npc, your message comes up. 2. Need help on messages such as: messages at starter page, messages from commands. 3. need a barrows code in nooby form. 4. Making myself/others different level mods 5. Changing the name of npc's, items, etc
(I am on TestScape)

i check the tutorials page and found nothing on it.
